author: Raghava M.
title: DK district administration faces hard time in conducting last rites of COVID-19 deceased woman
description: Large number of people oppose cremation in Mangaluru; police shift body to Bantwal
content: The Dakshina Kannada district administration had to face a hard time in conducting the last rites of the woman who died of COVID-19 in Mangaluru on Thursday as some people opposed the cremation planned at a crematorium in the city. Finally she was cremated in… [+2824 chars]
